Please try again and let me know if it's working.

TextBody:
Hi Jonathan,

You will need to apply the license yourself after downloading the product. You can use your existing license.

For PingCastle Standard, you have to apply the license in pingcastle.exe.config file.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Regards,
Ali Asif
Technical Support Engineer
1-949-407-5125 x1
____________________ _______
Cybersecurity That Works for You

6160 Warren Parkway, Suite 100, Frisco, TX 75034
www.netwrix.com

I am reaching out to the appropriate team to acquire your license and will send it as an attachment once I receive it.

Thank you,
